verses.verse: (For the choir director; on the Gittith. A Psalm of the sons of Korah.) <S%H4100>How<s%> <S%H3039>lovely<s%> are Thy <S%H4908>dwelling<s%> <S%H4908>places,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts!<s%>

My <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H3700>longed<s%> and <S%H1571>even<s%> <S%H3615>yearned<s%> for the <S%H2691>courts<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> My <S%H3820>heart<s%> and my <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H7442>sing<s%> for <S%H7442>joy<s%> to the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H410>God.<s%>

The <S%H6833>bird<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> has <S%H4672>found<s%> a <S%H1004>house,<s%> And the <S%H1866>swallow<s%> a <S%H7064>nest<s%> for herself, <S%H834>where<s%> she may <S%H7896>lay<s%> her <S%H667>young,<s%> Even Thine <S%H4196>altars,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> My <S%H4428>King<s%> and my <S%H430>God.<s%>
How <S%H835>blessed<s%> are those who <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in Thy <S%H1004>house!<s%> They are <S%H5750>ever<s%> <S%H1984>praising<s%> Thee. <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
How <S%H835>blessed<s%> is the <S%H120>man<s%> whose <S%H5797>strength<s%> is in Thee; In whose <S%H3824>heart<s%> are the <S%H4546>highways<s%> [to Zion]!

<S%H5674>Passing<s%> through the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H1056>Baca,<s%> they <S%H7896>make<s%> it a <S%H4599>spring,<s%> The <S%H9251>early<s%> <S%H9251>rain<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H5844>covers<s%> it with <S%H1293>blessings.<s%>
They <S%H1980>go<s%> from <S%H2428>strength<s%> to <S%H2428>strength,<s%> [Every one of them] <S%H7200>appears<s%> <S%H413>before<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion.<s%>
<S%H7200>Behold<s%> our <S%H4043>shield,<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> And <S%H5027>look<s%> upon the <S%H6440>face<s%> of Thine <S%H4899>anointed.<s%>

For a <S%H3117>day<s%> in Thy <S%H2691>courts<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> [outside.] I would rather <S%H5605>stand<s%> at the <S%H5605>threshold<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of my <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H4480>Than<s%> <S%H1752>dwell<s%> in the <S%H168>tents<s%> of <S%H7562>wickedness.<s%>

For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> is a <S%H8121>sun<s%> and <S%H4043>shield;<s%> The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> and <S%H9202>glory;<s%> <S%H3808>No<s%> <S%H9185>good<s%> <S%H9185>thing<s%> does He <S%H4513>withhold<s%> from those who <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H8549>uprightly.<s%>
O <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> How <S%H835>blessed<s%> is the <S%H120>man<s%> who <S%H982>trusts<s%> in Thee!
